thread.section_title: The Nadler Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quiet, comfortable and well equipped
thread.title_full: Quiet, comfortable and well equipped - Review of The Nadler Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SarahWorcester_UK
title: Quiet, comfortable and well equipped
text: My husband and I spent a night in London and were warmly welcomed by the receptionist who asked the purpose of our visit. When we told her we were celebrating our first wedding anniversary we were given a complimentary bottle of champagne - we'd already been upgraded to a superior room. The bedroom exceeded our expectations and offers great value for money for a London hotel. We had a quality kitchenette, huge super king bed and most of all complete quiet to sleep in. It's just round the corner from Earl's Court tube station in a lovely area of Kensington but still very easy to get into central London.
